title: Xbox Game Pass Lineup for February 2024 Announced - IGN Daily Fix
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Microsoft has announced February's lineup for new Game Pass titles, including the Resident Evil 3 remake, Madden 24, and more. Also a sneak peek at March's offerings: MLB The Show 24 will be available on March 19th on Game Pass, day one. In Nintendo news, the Switch just cannot be stopped. The hybrid console moved almost 14 million units in the first nine months of the financial year, which places its total sales to nearly 140 million units, 14 million shy of the PS2 which is the current best-selling console of all time. And finally, there's a new Elden Ring game in development, but no, it's not a sequel or more DLC.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox

title: Miles Morales actor Nadji Jeter got a call about The Last of Us HBO show! #spiderman #thelastofus
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone - Official Season 2 BlackCell Battle Pass Upgrade Trailer
description:
Another BlackCell Battle Pass Upgrade is back with Season 2 of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone. Players can now earn all new Reactive Skins upon upgrading to the premium BlackCell Battle Pass offering a vibrant look to in game weapons. The BlackCell Battle Pass Upgrade arrives to Season 2 of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone on February 7.

#IGN #Gaming #CallOfDuty

title: The Division 2 - Official Year 5 Vanguard Launch Trailer
description:
The Division 2 is a third-person open-world multiplayer shooter developed by Massive Entertainment and Ubisoft. Year 5 Season 3 Vanguard has arrived to the streets of The Division 2 bringing Agents back to New York to investigate the disappearance of Agent Kelso. The update also is fitted with an expansive change to the core game dubbed Project Resolve bringing fixes, updates, and quality of life changes to the game alongside a long-term commitment to supporting and improving The Division 2. The Division 2 Year 5 Season 3 is available now for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, Amazon Luna, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Skull and Bones - Official Launch Trailer
description: Will you become the most fearsome pirate kingpin? Check out the launch trailer for Skull and Bones for another look at the adventure that await in this upcoming co-op open-world pirate action RPG. Skull and Bones will be available on February 16, 2024, and an open beta is available to play for free from February 8 to February 11, 2024.

title: Here's Why There's Been So Many Layoffs in Video Games
description:
As layoffs continue en force in 2024, one reason for the massive video game industry shake-up is a result of the acquisitions rush from the past two years.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Nightingale - Official Early Access Release Date Trailer
description:
Watch the latest trailer for Nightingale for another look at the upcoming PVE survival-crafting game, including an update regarding the early access release date. Nightingale will now be available in Early Access on PC via Steam and Epic Game Store on February 20, 2024.

In Nightingale, discover, explore and survive the mysterious Faewilds. Set in a Victorian gaslamp fantasy world, the game can be played solo or teamed up with up to 5 friends. Traverse across the Realms, and open portals to new destinations by crafting Realm Cards, while building and customizing estates, and fighting to survive.

title: Atomic Heart: Trapped in Limbo DLC #2 - Official Launch Trailer
description:
Explore the twisted world of Limbo, learn more about the story, and see action-packed gameplay in this launch trailer for the Atomic Heart: Trapped in Limbo DLC, available now on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, and PC.

Return to the mad world of Limbo, continue the story, and, with the help of the Twin’s essence, get through the combat extravaganza and Limbo-flavored challenges in this second DLC for the first-person shooter game.

#AtomicHeart #Gaming #IGN

title: Helldivers 2 - Official 'The Story So Far' Trailer
description:
Helldivers 2 is a third-person action shooter developed by Arrowhead Studios. Players will venture out into the galaxy to slay dangerous enemies and reclaim planets into the Super Earth alliance all in the name of freedom. Take a look at the latest trailer to get the story so far spanning from the original Helldivers release to the upcoming Helldivers 2. Helldivers 2 is launching on February 8 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC.

#Helldivers2 #Helldivers #Gaming

title: WWE 2K24 - Official Gameplay Trailer
description:
WWE 2K24 is the latest installment in the wrestling game simulation game developed by Visual Concepts. Get a first look at gameplay featuring all-new match types, environments, Superstars and more. WWE 2K24 also celebrates 40 years of WrestleMania history with highlights and historic moments featuring several of the biggest Superstars and Legends of all time. WWE 2K24 is launching on March 8 for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

#WWE #Gaming #Wrestling

title: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League - 13 Things it Doesn't Tell You
description: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League is a game with a ton of different systems, many of which don't even come into play until the late game. If it's ever a little overwhelming, and some explanations go over your head, or just aren't seen in the first place, here are a list of tips to help you Kill the Justice league, and beyond.

title: Bob Marley: One Love - Official Teaser Trailer (2024) Kingsley Ben-Adir, Lashana Lynch
description:
Check out the Big Game Spot for Bob Marley: One Love for another look at the upcoming movie. Bob Marley: One Love stars Kingsley Ben-Adir, Lashana Lynch, James Norton, Tosin Cole, Umi Myers, Anthony Welsh, Nia Ashi, Aston Barrett Jr., Anna-Sharé Blake, Gawaine “J-Summa” Campbell, Naomi Cowan, Alexx A-Game, Michael Gandolfini, Quan-Dajai Henriques, David Kerr, Hector Roots Lewis, Abijah “Naki Wailer” Livingston, Nadine Marshall, Sheldon Shepherd, Andrae Simpson, and Stefan A.D Wade.

Bob Marley: One Love celebrates the life and music of an icon who inspired generations through his message of love and unity. On the big screen for the first time, discover Bob’s powerful story of overcoming adversity and the journey behind his revolutionary music. Bob Marley: One Love is produced in partnership with the Marley family. It is produced by Robert Teitel, p.g.a., Dede Gardner,p.g.a., Jeremy Kleiner, p.g.a., Ziggy Marley, p.g.a., Rita Marley, and Cedella Marley. Brad Pitt, Richard Hewi

title: Why Winnie The Pooh Looks Gruesomely Different in Blood and Honey 2 - IGN The Fix: Entertainment
description: We got the exclusive Winnie the Pooh: Blood and Honey 2 trailer, and with a larger budget comes better production value. In this sequel, we can expect to see the return of Winnie and Piglet, joined by their best friends Tigger, and Owl. Both Pooh Bear and Piglet are sporting new looks in #WinnieThePooh #BloodandHoney2, completely different from their appearances in the previous film. Actor Scott Chambers is taking on the role of Christopher Robin in Winnie The Pooh: Blood and Honey 2.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 - Official Season 2 Multiplayer Maps Trailer
description:
Three new 6v6 maps--Stash House, Vista, and Departures--are coming to Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 in Season 2. Check out the latest trailer for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 for a peek at these multiplayer maps ahead of Season 2's launch on February 7, 2024.

#IGN #Gaming #CallOfDuty
